title: Inspired run over four days in Brooklyn lifts Virginia Tech to first-ever ACC Tournament title - VT hokiesports.com
content: Inspired run over four days in Brooklyn lifts Virginia Tech to first-ever ACC Tournament title  VT hokiesports.com
description: One of the most improbable, inspiring runs in the prestigious history of the ACC Tournament ended with maroon and orange confetti falling to the floor of the Barclays Center in Brooklyn, New York.
